name: Gramercy Tavern's Old Orleans
description: Tart and aromatic cider blends with sweet orange curaçao, and spicy bitters to create a warming autumn cocktail.
recipeIngredient: 2 dashes Fee Bros. whiskey barrel aged bitters

recipeInstructions.text: Chill an old-fashioned glass. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice and add aperitif cider, apple brandy, maraschino liqueur, orange curaçao, and bitters. Stir until very cold, about 15 seconds. Strain into the prepared glass.
